page.title: 02INTRODUCING OUR AREA
page.content: SURROUNDING THESE COMPLEXES IS FARMLAND SUCH AS DUNSTAN FARM.ALSO ANOTHER IMPORTANT FACTOR IS ELMDON TRADING ESTATE WHICH IS A STORAGE FACILITY MADE UP OF WAREHOUSES.THE AIR,RAIL AND ROAD NETWORKS MAKE THIS AN IDEAL SITE FOR COMPANIES TO STORE GOODS READY FOR DISPATCH.THESE MAJOR ROADS ARE M42,M6 AND THE A45.IT IS UNUSUAL THAT SUCH HIGHLY DEVELOPED COMPLEXES SHOULD BE SITUATED ON AND AROUND PRODUCTIVE FARMLAND.IT WILL BE INTERESTING TO SEE IF THE FARMLAND WILL BE ABLE TO SURVIVE THE GROWTH OF THESE DEVELOPING INDUSTRIES.
